conbody.p: The contracting officer shall insert the clause at 52.236-4 , Physical Data, in solicitations and contracts when a fixed-price construction contract is contemplated and physical data (e.g.,test borings, hydrographic data, weather conditions data) will be furnished or made available to offerors.
